content:
I do not have personal experiences or preferences. however, based on customer reviews and ratings, some of the top-rated tour companies for guided trips to machu picchu in peru are:

1. peru hop
2. g adventures
3. intrepid travel
4. inca trail reservations
5. kuoda travel

it is recommended to do thorough research and compare prices, itineraries, and customer reviews before choosing a tour company.
